PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^x8888FF^xB97123ACT 1^7 --------------------------- Links: ^x3F6DB3B^7^x70FF70^x3F6DB3B^x70FF70G^7^7 - ^x8888FF^x3F6DB3Spark^7^7 / ^x70FF70Pierce^7 / ^x70FF70^x3F6DB3Added Lightning^7 ^xE05030R^7^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 / ^x3F6DB3Added Lightning^7 ^x3F6DB3BBB^7 - ^x3F6DB3Frost Blink^7 or ^x7070FF^x8888FF^x3F6DB3Flame Dash^7^7^7 / ^x3F6DB3Arcane Surge^7 / ^xE05030^x3F6DB3Flame Wall^7^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Clarity^7 ^xE05030R^7 - ^xE05030Steelskin^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Level up in off hand ^x3F6DB3B ^7- ^x3F6DB3Freezing Pulse ^x3F6DB3B ^7- ^x3F6DB3Ice Spear ^7 ^xE05030R^7 - ^xE05030Spell Totem^7 --------------------------- START --------------------------- ^x8888FFMule on a ranger for Pierce (get in the chest on way to Hillock) and Sniper's Mark (Breaking Some Eggs Quest at level 4) and grab any green gem to save for later keep 2 green gems from ranger (use these to make topaz rings with iron ring crafting recipie if you dont find topaz rings to later use on the weapon craft)^7 ^x70FF70^x8888FFReroll to Templar^7^7^7^x7070FF ^7Use the bellow and copy / paste it into vendors to highlight items you might want to buy with the right sockets / colors^7 ^xE05030b-b-b|g-b-b|nne ^xD02090Quest reward: frostbolt^7 (we dont use it so doesnt matter really) look for GBB from vendors -- this is most important colors (Spark / Pierce / Added Lightning) ^xFFFF77buy spark from vendor buy arcane surge^7 ^xD02090Quest reward: flame totem and frost blink^7 ^xFFFF77buy flame wall^7 ^xD02090Quest reward: added lightning^7 (put first one on spark) ^xFFFF77buy added lightning 1 transmute^7 ^xFFFF77buy spell totem 1 transmute buy freeze pulse 1 wisdom^7 ^xFFFF77buy Steelskin for 1 wisdom^7 ^xD02090Quest reward: leapslam but dont level up^7 ^xFFFF77buy clarity and life tap (dont level up) 1 trans each^7 ^xFFFF77buy ice spear^7 find and equip heavy belt and jade amulet for attribute help
^xB97123ACT 2^7 --------------------------- Links: ^x3F6DB3B^7^x70FF70^x3F6DB3B^7^x70FF70G^7^7 - ^x3F6DB3Spark^7 /^x70FF70 Pierce^7 / ^x70FF70^x3F6DB3Added Lightning^7^7 ^xE05030R^x3F6DB3BB^7 - ^xE05030Spell Totem^7 / ^x3F6DB3Wave of Conviction^7 / ^x3F6DB3Added Lightning^7 ^x3F6DB3BBB^7 -^x3F6DB3 Flame Dash ^7/ ^x3F6DB3Arcane Surge^7 / ^xE05030Flame Wall^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Clarity^7 ^xE05030R ^7- ^xE05030Steelskin^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Herald of Thunder^7 ^x70FF70G^7^7 - ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Level up in off hand ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Freezing Pulse ^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Ice Spear ^7 ---------------------------
^xD02090Quest reward: herald of thunder^7 ^xFFFF77buy wave of conviction --- drop flame totem and use spell totem, wave of convition and added lightning^7 ^xFFFF77buy faster attacks^7 (leap slam) make your 2 scepters at level 20 ^xE05030^x70FF70~~~~ Use Essence of Woe on a Spiraled Wand and then use 4 transmutes to craft flat lightning dmg to spells (unlock this in Piety's boss room) ~~~~^7^7
^xB97123ACT 3^7 --------------------------- Links: ^x3F6DB3BB^7^xE05030R^7^x70FF70G^7 - ^xE05030Spell Totem^7 / ^x3F6DB3Spark ^7/ ^x70FF70Pierce^7 /^x3F6DB3 Lightning Pen^7 ^xE05030^x70FF70G^7^x3F6DB3BB^7^7 (optional) - ^x3F6DB3Charged Mines^7 / ^x3F6DB3Wave of Conviction ^7/ ^x70FF70Swift Assembly^7 ^x3F6DB3BBB^7 - ^x3F6DB3Flame Dash ^7/^7 ^x3F6DB3Arcane Surge^7 / ^xE05030Flame Wall^7 ^xE05030^x3F6DB3B^7 ^7- ^x3F6DB3Clarity^7 ^xE05030R^7 - ^xE05030Steelskin^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Wrath ^7 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Level up in off hand (dual daggers to get the colors) ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Freezing Pulse^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Ice Spear ^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Hatred^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Cold Pen^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 ^x70FF70G ^7- ^x70FF70Hypothermia^7 ---------------------------
at lvl 24 check vendors for 4 link (BBGR) and use following copy / paste for the vendors ^xE05030-[rgb]-.-|rint^7 ^xD02090Quest reward: conductivity^7 any 4 link ES base is what you should start looking for around this level (to chrome a BBGR if needed) ^xD02090Quest reward: lightning pen^7 Buy the following from library quest ^xFFFF77buy snipers mark buy wrath once you get 1st lab you can take ancestral bond and drop wave of conviction now. make sure to have at least 2 mana flasks
^xB97123ACT 4^7 --------------------------- Links: ^x3F6DB3BB^7^xE05030R^7^x70FF70G^7 - ^xE05030Spell Totem^7 / ^x3F6DB3Spark^7 / ^x70FF70Pierce^7 / ^x3F6DB3Lightning Pen^7 ^x3F6DB3BBB^7 - ^x3F6DB3Flame Dash ^7/ ^x3F6DB3Arcane Surge^7 / ^xE05030Flame Wall^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Clarity^7 ^xE05030R^7 - ^xE05030Steelskin^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Wrath ^7 ^xE05030R^7^x3F6DB3B ^7- ^xE05030CWDT^7 / ^x3F6DB3Lightning Golem^7 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Level up in off hand (dual daggers to get the colors) ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Freezing Pulse^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Ice Spear ^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Hatred^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Cold Pen^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 ^x70FF70G ^7- ^x70FF70Hypothermia^7 --------------------------- ^xFFFF77after piety and lvl 38 buy eternal blessing from act 4 ^7 ^xFFFF77also buy CWDT link to lightning golem^7 ^xD02090Quest reward: Greatyer multiple projectiles^7 ^xFFFF77buy CWDT buy multi Totem^7 (we dont use this until we get soul mantle)
^xB97123ACT 6^7 ^xFFFF77Buy tornado^7 ^xFFFF77and enteral blessing^7 --------------------------- Links UNTIL Soul Mantle swap: ^x3F6DB3BB^xE05030R^x70FF70G^7 - ^xE05030Spell Totem^7 / ^x3F6DB3Spark^7 /^x70FF70 Pierce^7 / ^x3F6DB3Lightning Pen^7 ^x3F6DB3BB^xE05030R ^7-^x3F6DB3 Flame Dash^7 /^7 ^x3F6DB3Arcane Surge^7 / ^x3F6DB3^xE05030Steelskin^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Clarity^7 ^x70FF70G ^7- ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Wrath^7 / ^xE05030Eternal Blessing^7 ^xE05030R^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^xE05030CWDT^7 / ^x3F6DB3Lightning Golem^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Tornado^7 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Level up in off hand (dual daggers to get the colors) ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Freezing Pulse^7 ^x3F6DB3B^7 - ^x3F6DB3Ice Spear ^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Hatred^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Cold Pen^7 ^x70FF70G^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 ^x70FF70G ^7- ^x70FF70Hypothermia^7 ---------------------------
